details.SQL Query:
EXPLAIN
SELECT
  coalesce(json_agg(row_to_json("%5_universe")), '[]') AS "universe"
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      *
    FROM
      (
        SELECT
          coalesce(json_agg(row_to_json("%6_rows")), '[]') AS "rows"
        FROM
          (
            SELECT
              "%0_Album"."AlbumId" AS "AlbumId",
              "%0_Album"."ArtistId" AS "ArtistId",
              "%0_Album"."ArtistId" AS "__hasura_phantom_field__ArtistId",
              "%1_RELATIONSHIP_Tracks"."Tracks" AS "Tracks"
            FROM
              "public"."Album" AS "%0_Album"
              LEFT OUTER JOIN LATERAL (
                SELECT
                  row_to_json("%1_RELATIONSHIP_Tracks") AS "Tracks"
                FROM
                  (
                    SELECT
                      *
                    FROM
                      (
                        SELECT
                          coalesce(json_agg(row_to_json("%3_rows")), '[]') AS "rows"
                        FROM
                          (
                            SELECT
                              "%2_Track"."TrackId" AS "TrackId",
                              "%2_Track"."AlbumId" AS "__hasura_phantom_field__AlbumId"
                            FROM
                              "public"."Track" AS "%2_Track"
                            WHERE
                              ("%0_Album"."AlbumId" = "%2_Track"."AlbumId")
                          ) AS "%3_rows"
                      ) AS "%3_rows"
                  ) AS "%1_RELATIONSHIP_Tracks"
              ) AS "%1_RELATIONSHIP_Tracks" ON ('true')
          ) AS "%6_rows"
      ) AS "%6_rows"
  ) AS "%5_universe"

EXPLAIN
SELECT
  coalesce(json_agg("%5_universe_agg"."universe"), '[]') AS "universe"
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      row_to_json("%2_universe") AS "universe"
    FROM
      json_to_recordset(cast($1 as json)) AS "%0_%variables_table"("%variable_order" int)
      CROSS JOIN LATERAL (
        SELECT
          *
        FROM
          (
            SELECT
              coalesce(json_agg(row_to_json("%3_rows")), '[]') AS "rows"
            FROM
              (
                SELECT
                  "%1_Artist"."ArtistId" AS "ArtistId"
                FROM
                  "public"."Artist" AS "%1_Artist"
                WHERE
                  (
                    "%1_Artist"."ArtistId" = cast("%0_%variables_table"."$ArtistId" as int4)
                  )
              ) AS "%3_rows"
          ) AS "%3_rows"
      ) AS "%2_universe"
    ORDER BY
      "%0_%variables_table"."%variable_order" ASC
  ) AS "%5_universe_agg"

EXPLAIN
SELECT
  coalesce(json_agg("%5_universe_agg"."universe"), '[]') AS "universe"
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      row_to_json("%2_universe") AS "universe"
    FROM
      json_to_recordset(cast($1 as json)) AS "%0_%variables_table"("%variable_order" int)
      CROSS JOIN LATERAL (
        SELECT
          *
        FROM
          (
            SELECT
              coalesce(json_agg(row_to_json("%3_rows")), '[]') AS "rows"
            FROM
              (
                SELECT
                  "%1_Album"."AlbumId" AS "AlbumId"
                FROM
                  "public"."Album" AS "%1_Album"
                WHERE
                  (
                    "%1_Album"."AlbumId" = cast("%0_%variables_table"."$AlbumId" as int4)
                  )
              ) AS "%3_rows"
          ) AS "%3_rows"
      ) AS "%2_universe"
    ORDER BY
      "%0_%variables_table"."%variable_order" ASC
  ) AS "%5_universe_agg"
